question: Which two countries have collaborated in the "Innovation for Clean Air (IfCA) " initiative launched in Bengaluru in August 2019 in the field of electric vehicles?
explanation: The "Innovation for Clean Air (IfCA)", a two-year United Kingdom-India joint initiative providing Indian and UK stakeholders opportunities to test interventions related to air quality and Electric Vehicles integration, was launched in Bengaluru, Karnataka in August 2019.
